ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: YAY!  another Povarian, Povarite, or whatever we are ... few others that I alternate between, 38 wood elf druid, Tilianye, 20 gnome necro, Kammi, 18 high elf
ygData.messageBody:
YAY! another Povarian, Povarite, or whatever we are
:) My main is a 54 dwarf warrior, Ainthara. I have a
few others that I alternate between, 38 wood elf
druid, Tilianye, 20 gnome necro, Kammi, 18 high elf
mage, Calye and my most recent fetish is my 17 Vah
Shir rogue, Hissifit. I'm on mainly in the evenings.
Give me a tell anytime and we can group up if you'd
like. (same goes for anyone here on Povar)

Ainthara

--- "onezdezired <onezdezire@...>"
<onezdezire@...> wrote:
> Greetings All,
>
> Just wanted to introduce myself. I have a 53 Shamie
> Barbie Sindaani,
> 28 SK DE Tumlarya and a few other younger ones on
> Povar. I have been
> playing for the past um 3 years almost and love the
> game. I don't
> have alot of time as many others do but I try to get
> in a couple of
> hours here and there in the late evening.
>
> So, I look forward to seeing you all later...
>
> Take care,
>
> Sindaani Deselvetarm
> Shaman "Blonde Moment" Barbie of the 53 Winter.
>
>
